data.title: Hermes S Stylianides & Co.
data.meta_description: Hermes S Stylianides & Co. is a Cyprus business located in Limassol. It is listed in our CyprusNet
data.text: Hermes S. Stylianides, a graduate of Athens University, set up his practice in 1985 in Limassol (the island's main harbour and business centre). He has since gained experience in the provision of many types of legal services and has steadily developed an international clientele with special interest in corporate law, intellectual property, shipping and immovable property.
